root.name: Medieval Moves: Deadmund's Quest
root.description: Great job, Jeremy!Medieval Moves: Deadmund's Quest is a medieval action-adventure game developed by Zindagi, creators of the Move game Sports Champions. The evil sorcerer Morgrimm and his skeleton army have invaded Prince Edmund’s Castle. While trying to stop Morgrimm, Prince Edmund is also turned into a skeleton...now named “Deadmund”, he must fight to save his homeland and defeat Morgrimm to restore order to the kingdom.
